column1: The Purple Pig////On the Mag Mile
column2: some consider The Purple Pig a "tourist trap"
column3: I think of it as a "tourist hot spot". Unfortunately
column4: as a result of how busy they are
column6: so expect to wait for a table. I got to the restaurant at around 5:45pm on a Thursday night and was lucky enough to get the last two seats at the bar
column7: but from when I was there till when I left at 8:30pm
column8: there were people waiting for both floor tables and bar seats.
